Translations.Text: N’abantu bavuga bati:- mbega ninaba narapfuye ni vy’ukuri nzozurwa nsubire kuba muzima
Mbega umuntu ntiyibuka yuko twamuremye imbere yuko ataraba ikintu icarico cose
Rero ndarahiye ku Muremyi wawe yuko mu vy’ukuri abantu bose tuzobegeranya hamwe n’amashetani, hanyuma tuberekana kuruhande rw’umuriro witiriwe Jahannamu, bace bahapfukamira
Hanyuma mu vy’ukuri tuzoba kurayo mumoko yabo yose, bamwe muri barya bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri gusumba nyene imigisha ihagije
Kandi mu vy’ukuri twebwe turabazi neza cane abakwiwe guturirwa muri uwo muriro udahera
Kandi nta n’umwe muri mwebwe atari uwuzoshikira uwo muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, kandi ningombwa ku Muremyi wawe yamaze gucira urwo rubanza
Hanyuma tuzorokora bamwe batinya Imana yabo bimwe biboneka, hanyuma dusigaze abahemukiye Imana yabo y’ukuri bapfukamye muri uwo muriro udahera

No mugihe basomewe amajambo yacu ari k’umugaragaro, baca bavuga bamwe bahakana Imana y’ukuri babwira abemeye Imana y’ukuri bati:- ni igiki kiri hagati y’imirwi ibiri ifise ubwicaro bwiza hamwe n’uwufise abantu b’iteka
N’ibinjana bingahe twahoneje imbere y’abo vyari bifise ibisharizo vyiza gusumba n’amaratiro meza cane

Vuga uti:- abari mubuzimire nyene imigisha myinshi izo bongereza ikiringo kugeza aho bazo kwibonera muvyo batujijwe, kumbure vyoba ari ibihano canke n’umusi w’umuhero w’Isi, aho niho bazomenya uwuzoba afise ubwicaro bubi canke n’uwuzoba afise ingabo zidafise ubushobozi
N’Imana yama ibongereza uburokoke bamwe barokotse, n’ibikorwa vyiza bisigara nibirya n’ivyo vyiza mugihe c’impembo yawe imbere y’Umuremyi wawe kandi bikaba ari vyiza mu vyabaye
Mbega wabonye umwe mubahakanye amajambo yacu nukuvuga ati:- mu vy’ukuri jewe narahawe amatungo n’ibibondo
Mbega yaronse inkuru zitazwi, canke yaronse indagano ku Mana nyene imigisha myinshi ihagije
Sivyo none, mu vy’ukuri turandika ivyo avuga vyose, kandi tuzo mwongereza ikiringo kirekire c’ibihano
Tuzotorana muvyo avuga vyose,	kandi azo kwishikana wenyene
Baragize izindi mana atari Imana y’ukuri kugira ngo babatere intege mukuba fasha
Oya! Bazohakana amasengesho yabo, kandi bazoba abatumvikana nabo
